rules.name: accurateEntityPositions
rules.description: Will send an entity position packet for every tick
extras: May cause severe network lag if too many entities are loaded

rules.name: anvilColorFormatting
rules.description: Allows the use of spigot formatting inside of anvils
extras: To see formatting codes use /weird color

rules.name: blockTransparency
rules.description: Makes all the blocks in the game act like transparent blocks!

rules.name: blockUpdateHell
rules.description: Basically all setBlock calls will use this number
extras: Custom block updates from: -1 to 127 | use -2 to disable
validators: You must choose a value from -2 to 127

rules.name: blueSkullTesting
rules.description: Makes it so blue skulls from wither always spawn to test if your wither based farm will break
extras: Entity: Makes it so skulls have a 100% chance of spawning when wither is targeting an entity
Passive: Makes it so theres 100% chance of blue skulls spawning passively

rules.name: breakableDragonEgg
rules.description: Allows the dragon egg to be mined

rules.name: catOnChestBypass
rules.description: Makes it so that cats on chests do not prevent the chest from opening

rules.name: commandWeird
rules.description: Enables the /weird command
extras: The /weird command allows for chunk monitoring as well as other weird additions that need more arguments then a carpet rule
validators: Can be limited to 'ops' only, or a custom permission level

rules.name: dragonAlwaysDropsEgg
rules.description: Ender Dragon always drops a dragon egg when killed

rules.name: enchantmentOverride
rules.description: Allows you to enchant past the highest vanilla enchant limit using /enchant
extras: Also makes it so every enchantment works on all items

rules.name: executeBlockLimit
rules.description: Customizable execute volume limit
extras: It's weird cause nobody knows this limit exists xD
validators: You must choose a value from 1 to 20M

rules.name: fallingBlockMechanic
rules.description: A mechanic to make any block a falling block
extras: If a LIT lamp is moved under a beacon which has a fallingBlock above it, the block below the lamp turns into a falling block

rules.name: fastLiquidFlow
rules.description: Makes all liquid ticks happen within the next tick

rules.name: fastPistons
rules.description: Pistons will extend and retract with 1 tick of delay

rules.name: fastTileTicks
rules.description: Makes all tile ticks happen within the next tick

rules.name: featherFallingPlus
rules.description: Feather falling prevents trampling crops

rules.name: instantFall
rules.description: Re-implementing instant fall into 1.16, what could possibly go wrong

rules.name: instantFallMechanic
rules.description: A game mechanic for instant fall. Requires a lit redstone lamp to be moved in border chunks surrounded by border chunks.
extras: Also makes it so that instantFall turns off when generating new chunks.

rules.name: instantLiquidFlow
rules.description: Instant-Liquid flow in 1.16, basically instant tile ticks but for liquids

rules.name: instantTileTick
rules.description: Re-implementing instant tile ticks into 1.16. Although it's more of an imitation

rules.name: instantTileTickMechanic
rules.description: A game mechanic for instant tick ticks. Requires a lit redstone lamp to be moved in border chunks surrounded by Ticking Chunks
extras: Also makes it so that instantTileTick crashes the server when generating new chunks
vanilla makes it so that instantLiquidFlow works with instantTileTicks like its does in 1.12

rules.name: movableMovingPiston
rules.description: Makes moving_piston (B36) movable. Requires MovableBlockEntities to be on. Very unstable and made for the fun of proving it can be done!
validators: MovableBlockEntities must be enabled to use this

rules.name: observerDelay
rules.description: Change the delay length of observers (how long it takes to turn on)

rules.name: observerPulse
rules.description: Change the pulse length of observers (how long it stays on)

rules.name: onlineMode
rules.description: Allows you to toggle onlineMode

rules.name: permaloader
rules.description: This is a joke, it actually just prevents all chunks from being unloaded ;)

rules.name: preventBreaking
rules.description: Prevents all players from breaking blocks

rules.name: scaffoldingBreaking
rules.description: Scaffolding breaking rules. Change how scaffolding breaks

rules.name: shulkerCancer
rules.description: Shulkers can become cancer, just place a bunch of shulkers next to each other!

rules.name: spongeAbsorbsExplosions
rules.description: Sponge will prevent block explosion damage if its in the tnt list of blocks to break

rules.name: spongeCeption
rules.description: Sponge, sponges itself

rules.name: spongeEverything
rules.description: Makes it so that sponges can absorb all blocks :}

rules.name: spongeFaster
rules.description: Modify sponges so that the blocks they remove don't create blockUpdates

rules.name: spongeInfinite
rules.description: Removes all restrictions that sponges have
extras: You can still change the spongeLimit to avoid crashing. spongeLimit is ignored if its the default value!

rules.name: spongeLava
rules.description: The sponge now absorbs lava instead of water, you happy now?

rules.name: spongeLimit
rules.description: Change the max amount of that a sponge can absorb

rules.name: spongeReusable
rules.description: Sponge does not become wet when used
extras: If spongeCeption is enabled, this will not do anything

rules.name: totallyLegitElytra
rules.description: Elytra won't take damage from flight

rules.name: uncappedTridentSpeed
rules.description: Makes it so that tridents can move just as fast as they usually do on the y-axis on the x & z axis

rules.name: worldborderSpecial
rules.description: Everything works the same past the world border
